title: Nicosia Turkish Municipality
text:
Nicosia Turkish Cypriot Municipality () is the governing body of <a href="North%20Nicosia">North Nicosia</a> province of <a href="Northern%20Cyprus">TRNC</a>. It was established in 1958 and was recognized by Article 173 of the Constitution of the <a href="Cyprus">Republic of Cyprus</a>. After 1974 and the <a href="Turkish%20invasion%20of%20Cyprus">Turkish invasion of Cyprus</a>, it became the municipality of North Nicosia. The current mayor is <a href="Mehmet%20Harmanc%C4%B1">Mehmet Harmancı</a>.
